item.title: America's Biggest Scam
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:21, topic:429287”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=531976.msg3890219#msg3890219 date=1326772904]

This is a scam worth hundreds of millions of dollars these company’s are paying into members of congress. Congress members are taking bribes to pass this bill just like they did with the whole “Bailout” thing. 2 men were found taking millions after the whole bailout happened. That is exactly what will happen if this gets passed. People are going to be paid for helping pass the bill, and these company’s like Viacom will take legal action to anyone who posts copyrighted material.

People don’t see how harsh this is. MoparScape/Moparisthebest can and most likely will be terminated forever if this bill passes.
That’s including the rest of these RSPS sites/servers. This is hitting our community right at heart and people are too ignorant to see that. That’s why I made this topic to help push it out there a little more. Even if 1 person takes this to another site or their friend, they are helping people learn what is really going on.

Finally someone with a brain. The only way to get past SOPA after the bill is passed, would be to have a password protected website.

Then let us make a password and save mopar!!!

fordsucks444

Darn congressmen

Fucking our shit up
[/quote]

If mopar goes down, I’m restarting it on the deep web
stupid government pussy faggots can’t touch me there :3
free cookies for who joins :D[/quote]
Full support.

Read full topic
